wikitext.*:
'''Mattocks''' were a type of weapon used by the [[Dwarves of the Iron Hills]] in the [[battle of Azanulbizar]]<ref name=":0">[[J.R.R. Tolkien]], ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', [[Appendix A]], "Durin's Folk"</ref> and in the [[battle of Five Armies]].<ref>{{Cite DTP|id=H 17.051}}</ref> They were heavy and required two hands to use.<ref>{{Cite DTP|id=H 17.031}}</ref> [[Náin (son of Grór)|Náin]] used a mattock in the [[battle of Azanulbizar]] fighting against [[Azog]], but his mattock splintered on the stone and Náin himself was killed<ref name=":0" />.{{references}}
